articles.title: WT API is currently unavailable
articles.author: Samuel
articles.content:
The upstream WT server is currently unreachable. This is an offline fallback article so the website stays usable.

When WT comes back, the app will switch to live articles automatically and cache them.

articles.title: How this site stays reliable when the backend dies
articles.author: Samuel
articles.content:
This project uses a provider chain: cache → WT → backup CDN/raw → local seed.

  • If WT fails, users still see articles.
  • Search & filters still work.
  • Comments can be stored locally when POST fails.
